sait.mms.drivers

Class MariaDBDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • sait.mms.drivers.MariaDBDriver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DatabaseDriver

    public class MariaDBDriver
extends java.lang.Object
implements DatabaseDriver
    Description: Driver class to connect java to mariaDB databases so java statements to retrieve and update the databse can be carried out.
